About Me

My name is Bright Kingsley. I am a 19 year old full stack web developer, with about a year of experience designing useful and approachable user interfaces. I have knowledge in many aspects of design best practices and emerging UI development techniques. I am skilled at employing frameworks, as well as designing customized UI/UX profiles for specific client needs. I look forward to connecting and working with like minded tech enthusiasts while I learn new things and pick up new skills along my wonderful tech journey

My Skillset

  • Building amazing website layouts with HyperText Markup Language.

  • Building interactive websites and web applications with proceedural and object-oriented javascript.

  • Creating and maintaining smooth and optimsized single page applications with react.

  • Building secure backend and database with express, mongodb and socket.io

  • Excellent comunication skills and prompt reply to calls and messages

  • Critical thinking and high problem solving skills
